songs.title: Rabbi Holding Guns
songs.lyrics:
[Verse]
As a kid I used to get illegal funds
Sellin' drugs G like Mayer Lansky
I'm Bugsy Siegel with guns
Grew up in Brooklyn, roaches in my bed at night
We get in fight with anti-semits and hit 'em with lead pipes
If I could go back to when the Jews died in Europe
I be a Rabbi holding guns bucking at the Führer
Fuck a swastika my posse are sickos we'll throw Nazi's through windows
Hitler was a homosexual cock sucking dick blower
Cracking skulls open till I'm blood soaked in your hemoglobin
For being racist your faces get covered raisins
I'm like Dutch Schultz catapulting bullets I should win a Pulitzer for the way my literature hits ya like descriptions in sinners
[?] young kipper or Russian [?] never talk [?] or horror or you get your mouth stuffed with [?]
Brooklyn to Israel
It's Necro repping it like Arnold Rothstein the criminal
